root: ^After the events of the war, Galedric left House Ivy and began his own path. A path he took with you. He often struggled to find structure now that he was independent with you, but you helped them learn to relax and take care of himself.

^In return, Galedric made sure to take care of you: helping to provide a comfortable life for the two of you. He even taught you some battle techniques in case you ever find yourself in danger again. Though you both hope that nothing of the sort is needed.
